snippet.title: DRAGON BALL: The Breakers - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
When you enter the temporal seam, will you match as one of the 7 survivors or with you take the role of the rival Raider?

Introducing DRAGON BALL: The Breakers, coming to PS4, PS5, Xbox One, Xbox X|S Nintendo Switch, and PC 2022. Closed Beta Test coming soon to PC.
Pre-order: http://spr.ly/6057J5LPU
